Key Match Events: Anthony Davis had 31 points and 14 rebounds to lead the Lakers to a 104-99 victory over the Pelicans.
LeBron James highlighted a 21-point performance with a pair of pivotal 3-pointers in the final minutes.
Rookie Dalton Knecht hit five 3s to finish with a career-high 27 points in a spot start for the Lakers.
Brandon Ingram scored 32 points for the Pelicans.
Jaylen Nowell scored 16 points for the Pelicans.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Lakers extended their winning streak to five games.
LeBron James' career-long four-game triple-double streak came to an end.
The Pelicans led 56-46 at halftime but couldn't secure the win.
The Lakers outscored the Pelicans in the paint, 52-40.
